title: Blind Person

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Be blind. This does nothing, but it’s here so this role can technically spawn

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You can’t see who says what, but you can hear what’s being said
-If this role spawns, MrBeast (3492) must also exist
-If you’re cured you can see who says what

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be cured of your blindness by MrBeast

desc:
Post 3491
_Oh boy it sure is a great day to be blind_
